description: Drowzee was used by Raymond alongside Venomth and Pinsir in Mewtwo Strikes Back Evolution in an attempt to overwhelm Ash. They were all defeated by a Thunderbolt by Ash`s Pikachu. In the original movie, Mewtwo Strikes Back, Raymond did not have a Drowzee and instead Raymond`s Golem was used in the battle.
name: Sleep (Raymond)
